instruction: Create an email marketing campaign to promote a new product.
output:
Subject: Introducing our brand new product! 

Dear [Name], 

We are excited to announce the launch of our brand new product, [Product Name]. Our product is specially designed to [Insert product description]. We are confident that it can help to [Insert how the product helps users]. 

We believe our product is a game-changer and can provide you with [Insert benefit of the product]. 

Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity! We are offering a 20% discount on all orders placed within the next 10 days. 

To learn more, visit us at [Insert website link] or get in touch with us at [Insert contact details]. 

Thank you for your support, 
[Your Company Name]
